job_title: IT Senior Manager in Toronto, ON
pros: Amazing and inclusive culture! This is a workplace where people can be authentically themselves. The leadership and people truly care about each other and the youth and communities they serve.
cons: The organization is undergoing rapid change, so employees must be ready to adapt to shifts in their roles and in the organization
Part time work became challenging remotely.

job_title: Community STEM Club Program Facilitator in Toronto, ON
pros:
- Young, dynamic, diverse team 
- Caring environment 
- Great for self-directed/self-lead people
- Lots of opportunity to take initiative and shape your own vision
cons: None that I can think of
